body.name: Glade Automatic Spray Refill and Holder Kit, Air Freshener for Home and Bathroom, Hawaiian Breeze, 6.2 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 11 hrs 55 mins
features: Energize your air instantly with Glade Automatic Spray Air Freshener
Enjoy a fresh burst of tropical scent every 9, 18 or 36 min for a timed fragrance release
Say Aloha to relaxation with Glade automatic spray with notes of ripe pineapple, melon, and peach nectar
This Glade air freshener fragrance is crafted by master perfumers and infused with Essential Oils
Boost the fragrance of any room with battery operated air freshener
body.description: Transport yourself to an instant vacay with Glade Hawaiian Breeze® Automatic Spray Holder + Automatic Spray Refill. Say Aloha to relaxation with scent diffuser with notes of ripe pineapple, melon, and peach nectar. Glade air freshener fragrance is crafted by master perfumers. Switch things up with automatic air freshener dispenser in Hawaiian Breeze® fruity scent. Open the unit by squeezing the ribs on the side while pulling sides of holder apart. Insert Glade automatic spray refill and choose the time setting to release fragrance. This automatic air freshener spray gives a fresh burst every 9, 18 or 36 minutes. Surround yourself with room freshener fragrance infused with essential oils and take yourself on an exotic vacation from the comfort of your couch.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to use instructions Set it and forget it for up to 60 days of gentle mist at a 36 minute setting. To open the unit squeeze the ribs on the side, while pulling sides of holder apart. Remove the cap from the can and insert the can. Choose a time setting to release fragrance every 9, 18 or 36 minutes or press the 'boost' button anytime for an extra burst of fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like it, it works, I set it to spray every 39 min and it works great, so far everything is good, the only thing is that just like any of them there loud and it scares my dog but it’s a very good product the spray it comes with smells like pineapple :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells Good and lasts long. Sometimes I forget to turn it off over night and it’ll still feel full the next morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and smells great
reviews.reviewText: This works great and I love that it includes batteries and 1 can of great smelling glade spray. I wanted something easy for my mother to use where she doesn't need to worry about spraying and easy to use. It suits her needs and is a good value for the size, included everything for use and a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars That the fragrances are too strong annoying.
reviews.reviewText: Particular fragrances, smell like cheap perfume. But I also gave the product 4 stars on performance, as it’s easy to exchange cans and it releases the spray on time. I recommend it for bathrooms only, just make sure you’re comfortable with fragrance, everyone has their own tolerance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Glade is my favorite, especially because they make their machines so you can really use any brand of spray in them and it will still work! Air wick, they won't work if it's not their brand. Their prices are good and the batteries last a pretty good amount of time even if you have them set to go off very often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glade automatic Spray refill and holder
reviews.reviewText: Awesome product, long-lasting, clean and subtle. I will purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Listen!!! just buy this and thank me later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Leaked on wood furniture
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help cover the smell of a litter box. It works okay. Came packaged great and undamaged. Easy to put it together and it came with batteries. The smell itself it very pleasant and the design of the sprayer looks great and is not an eye sore. It has 3 different time settings; 9 minutes, 18 minutes and 36 minutes. I really wish it had more, longer timed settings but I keep mine on 36 and it works fine. There is also an option to turn it off if you wish. It really helps in covering foul odors and giving a room a fresh, pleasant smell. The spray itself is not silent and is actually decently loud. With no tv or music on, I can hear when it sprays from the complete opposite end of my house. I have gotten used to the sound over time. The scent container/can lasts for a very long time despite going off so many times a day. It lasted well over a month. The only complaint I have about this sprayer is that if it is not positioned correctly, it will leak and stain whatever it is set on. I set it on a top shelf to spray mid air. However, I found if it is not on the edge spraying into the air, the scent liquid will land right on the surface in front of the sprayer and will stain if it is delicate wood. Also, when it starts to run low in the can, it also leaks. Had to find that out the hard way unfortunately. As far as covering scents, it works great. But with the damage it caused to my furniture, I will no longer be using it.
